list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.query: SELECT repo AS __text, repo AS __value FROM repos ORDER BY repo

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.rework_churn_ratio_30d, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.single_owner_file_ratio_30d, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' p50') AS metric, argMax(m.pr_size_p50_loc, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' p90') AS metric, argMax(m.pr_size_p90_loc, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.pr_comments_per_100_loc, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.pr_reviews_per_100_loc, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.review_load_top_reviewer_ratio, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.pr_rework_ratio, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: Bus Factor (Truck Factor)
panels.description: The smallest number of developers that account for >= 50% of the total code churn.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.bus_factor, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

panels.title: Code Ownership Gini Coefficient
panels.description: Measure of knowledge distribution inequality. 0.0 = perfect equality, 1.0 = one person owns everything.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.code_ownership_gini, m.computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day
